IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO SUPPORT THE PRIORITIES OF SRU BY GENERATING AND MANAGING PRIVATE RESOURCES.
IRS990.MissionDesc: THE SLIPPERY ROCK UNIVERSITY FOUNDATION, INC. EXISTS TO SUPPORT THE PRIORITY NEEDS OF SLIPPERY ROCK UNIVERSITY BY GENERATING & MANAGING PRIVATE RESOURCES, BOTH FISCAL AND PHYSICAL.
IRS990.Desc: RAISE & MANAGE FUNDS THAT ARE USED SOLELY FOR SCHOLARSHIPS TO STUDENTS ATTENDING SLIPPERY ROCK UNIVERSITY & AWARD SAID SCHOLARSHIPS.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: RAISE SUPPORT FOR SLIPPERY ROCK UNIVERSITY STUDENTS, FACULTY, PROGRAMMING AND ATHLETIC TEAMS.

OtherLiabilitiesOrgGrp.Desc: DEPOSITS HELD IN CUSTODY FOR UNIVERSITY

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: COLLECTION OF LIMITED EDITION, SIGNED AND NUMBERED PRINTS BY JAMES D. WERLINE. 150 PRINTS DONATED BY ONE INDIVIDUAL AND 242 WORKS DONATED BY ANOTHER INDIVIDUAL. THIS COLLECTION ENHANCES THE ABILITY OF SLIPPERY ROCK UNIVERSITY FOUNDATION, INC. TO SUPPORT SLIPPERY ROCK UNIVERSITY'S EMPHASIS OF EDUCATION AND APPRECIATION OF THE ARTS. THROUGH ITS COLLEGE OF LIBERAL ARTS, SLIPPERY ROCK UNIVERSITY OFFERS ITS STUDENTS FIVE (5) BACHELOR OF FINE ARTS DEGREES, AND FIVE (5) MINOR DEGREES OF FINE ARTS. THE SRU COLLEGE OF EDUCATION PROVIDES ITS STUDENTS ACCESS TO 10 WELL-EQUIPPED ART STUDIOS. THE PRIVATE ART COLLECTION AND WORKS OF STUDENTS ARE SHARED AT NUMEROUS EVENTS THROUGHOUT THE YEAR IN SEVERAL EXHIBIT AREAS ON CAMPUS.

MANAGEMENT HAS EVALUATED THE EFFECT OF THE GUIDANCE PROVIDED BY U.S. GENERALLY ACCEPTED ACCOUNTING PRINCIPLES ON ACCOUNTING FOR UNCERTAIN INCOME TAXES. THE ORGANIZATION MAY RECOGNIZE THE TAX BENEFIT FROM A TAX POSITION ONLY IF IT IS MORE LIKELY THAN NOT THAT THE TAX POSITION WILL BE SUSTAINED ON EXAMINATION BY TAXING AUTHORITIES BASED ON THE TECHNICAL MERITS OF THE POSITION. EXAMPLES OF TAX POSITIONS INCLUDE THE TAX-EXEMPT STATUS OF THE ORGANIZATION AND VARIOUS POSITIONS RELATED TO THE POTENTIAL SOURCES OF UNRELATED BUSINESS TAXABLE INCOME. THE ORGANIZATION HAS ANALYZED ITS TAX POSITIONS TAKEN FOR FILINGS WITH THE INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE. THE ORGANIZATION BELIEVES THAT ITS INCOME TAX FILING POSITIONS WILL BE SUSTAINED UPON EXAMINATION AND DOES NOT ANTICIPATE ANY ADJUSTMENTS THAT WOULD RESULT IN A MATERIAL ADVERSE EFFECT ON THE ORGANIZATION'S FINANCIAL CONDITION, RESULTS OF OPERATIONS, OR CASH FLOWS.
SPECIAL EVENT COSTS NETTED AGAINST REVENUE ON FORM 990 65,794.
UNCOLLECTIBLE PLEDGES PROVISION 98,732. ACTUARIAL LOSSES ON ANNUITIES PAYABLE 29,772. SPECIAL EVENT COSTS NETTED AGAINST REVENUE ON FORM 990 65,794.
THE ORGANIZATION MAINTAINS RECORDS OF SCHOLARSHIPS AWARDED TO STUDENTS ATTENDING SLIPPERY ROCK UNIVERSITY. ADMISSION AND CONTINUED ENROLLMENT ARE MONITORED BY SLIPPERY ROCK UNIVERSITY.
THE ORGANIZATION USES AN OUTSIDE BROKERAGE FIRM TO SELL THE PUBLICLY TRADED SECURITIES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FINANCE COMMITTEE ANNUALLY REVIEWS ALL FEDERAL FILING REQUIREMENTS, AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS, AND HAS GENERAL OVERSIGHT OVER THE ENTIRE AUDIT PROCESS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE BY-LAWS STATE THAT AN INDIVIDUAL MUST EXPOSE THE CONFLICT AND REMOVE THEMSELVES FROM THE VOTE IF THE BOARD HAS REASONABLE CAUSE TO BELIEVE THE DIRECTOR, OFFICER, OR COMMITTEE MEMBER HAD FAILED TO DISCLOSE AN ACTUAL OR POSSIBLY FINANCIAL INTEREST. THE BOARD WILL AFFORD THE DIRECTOR, OFFICER, OR COMMITTEE MEMBER AN OPPORTUNITY TO EXPLAIN THE ALLEGED FAILURE TO DISCLOSE THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST. IF AFTER HEARING THE RESPONSE AND MAKING SUCH FURTHER INVESTIGATION AS THE BOARD DEEMS APPROPRIATE, THE BOARD DETERMINES THAT THE DIRECTOR, OFFICER OR COMMITTEE MEMBER HAS IN FACT FAILED TO DISCLOSE AN ACTUAL OR POSSIBLE CONFLICT OF INTEREST, IT WILL TAKE APPROPRIATE ACTION, WHICH MAY INCLUDE IMMEDIATE REMOVAL FROM THE POSITION HELD WITHIN THE FOUNDATION FOR SLIPPERY ROCK UNIVERSITY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION'S GOVERNING DOCUMENTS & FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE ALL AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.
UNCOLLECTIBLE PLEDGES PROVISION -98,732. ACTUARIAL LOSSES ON ANNUITIES PAYABLE -29,772. GAIN ON EXTINGUISHMENT OF DEBT 548,820.
THERE HAS BEEN NO CHANGE IN THE PROCESS FROM THE PRIOR YEAR.

IdRelatedTaxExemptOrgGrp.PrimaryActivitiesTxt: MANAGING MEMBER FOR SRUF CAMPUS HOUSING LLC
